creator: jpg@inubit.com
text:
JMeter 2.3RC3 HTTP proxy server only forwards (and records) http calls to port
80 of the requested server.
Recording test plans for applications running on a different port works fine
with JMeter 2.1, but not with current version.

creator: alf@i100.no
text:
This seems to be fixed with SVN change 556204, so if you need the fix right
away, you need to build from the source in SVN.

creator: alf@i100.no
text:
Or you could also just download the latest available nightly build, from
http://people.apache.org/builds/jakarta-jmeter/nightly/, which contains that fix.
